markdownRemark.html:
Does hearing eigenvalue or eigenvector trigger you? Have you ever solved for one, but didn't know what you were solving? Well, this post is clearly for you!

First of all, eigenvalue and eigenvector always sounded intimidating for me, and I think I know why now. It's because eigenvalue/eigenvector combines german and english, so it always sounded like a proper noun with no meaning. But actually, eigen means special or unique in German. So all this time, you have been solving these special little snow-, I mean special values and special vectors.
